About

Hello!

I’m Monica. I want to make the world a better place by finding solutions for complex public health problems. I have a MPH (biostatistics & epidemiology concentrations) from Boston University School of Public Health and a BA in anthropology from Reed College.

When I’m not doing research you can find me riding my bike, cooking Mexican food, making homemade bitters, and reading nerdy books about statistics.

Find me other places

You can find me on twitter: @mwgerber.
You can also find me github: monicagerber.

Thanks for reading!
